product.name: Sheer Curtains Faux Linen Semi Voile Light Filtering Drapes Pair for Bedroom Living Room, Set of 2 Grommet Top Window Curtain Panels (Each 54 x 84 Inch, White)
product.description:
Each curtain panel is constructed with durable rust proof silver grommets (1.6 inch inner diameter).
Easy to hang and easily move along the rod.
These sheer curtains are woven from chemical-free 100% tear-resistant and durable polyester, have a natural woven texture and appearance.
Soft to touch, maintain drape and no wrinkles.
Formaldehyde-free.
No loose threads.
Premium sewing threads and Stitching.
Quality workmanship.
During the day they still let the sun through but it casts a lovely hue in the room compared to the blinds.
They are light-filtering, not light-blocking. Helps to block the glare from the late-afternoon sun.
You can still see out of them when they are closed but still gives you a certain amount of privacy.
The sheerness of these curtains filters the light perfectly and blocks enough of the direct view into your living room from the street at night.
product.bullet_points:
• ✅ SOFT TO TOUCH: Our linen look sheer curtains are woven from chemical-free 100% tear-resistant and durable polyester, have a natural woven texture and appearance. Not only soft to touch, but also maintain drape and no wrinkles. Formaldehyde-free and environment friendly.
• ✅ GOOD PERFORMANCE: The linen textured wave sheer right balance the privacy and light. They are light-filtering, not light-blocking. Helps to block the glare from the late-afternoon sun. You can still see out of them when they are closed but still gives you a certain amount of privacy. The sheerness of these curtains filters the light perfectly and blocks enough of the direct view into your room from the street at night.
• ✅ DECENT DECOR: These timeless classic faux linen sheer panels will decorate your home with fresh effect, simple pattern has aesthetic look, decked out graceful and chic appearance to any space, creating a festive mood, perfectly match any home styles.
• ✅ WELL MADE: Package includes 2 semi sheer curtain panels. Each panel measures 54" width, total width is 108". And each features 8 rustproof silver grommets with an interior diameter of 1.6 inches. Recommend ordering 2 to 3 times rod width for proper look and fullness. Perfect for bedroom room, living room, dining room, office, patio and more.
• ✅ EASY TO CARE: Machine washable in cold water, gentle cycle, tumble dry on low heat, do not bleach, low temperature ironing.
